WorkItem.Description:
Sometimes, the Invoke-UIAControlContextMenu cmdlet is unable to invoke the menu and the only thing we are seeing is the waiting cursor near the red line of the square.
This is because the Invoke-UIAControlContextMenu and Invoke-UIAControlClick menu hit by default exactly into the upper-left corner.
WorkItem.Summary: The Invoke-UIAControlContextMenu cmdlet hits the highlighter

Comments.Message:
Since now, there are two settings:
[UIAutomation.Preferences]::ClickOnControlByCoordX = 3 and 
[UIAutomation.Preferences]::ClickOnControlByCoordY = 3.
These settings are always used in the Invoke-UIAcontrolContextMenu cmdlet and in the Invoke-UIAControlClick cmdlet when no values were specified for parameters -X or -Y.
